pkgmetadata.longdescription: SourceMap~~~~~~~~~Parse JavaScript source maps. >>> import sourcemap >>> sourcemap.discover('...') 'jquery.min.map' >>> index = sourcemap.loads('...') >>> index.lookup(line=10, column=10) <Token: dst_line=10 dst_column=10 src='jquery.js' src_line=50 src_col=200 name='lol'>:copyright: (c) 2013 by Matt Robenolt:license: BSD, see LICENSE for more details.
